name: d2k
description: rendering engine from the Dark side of the Force - wip
author: monsieurbadia (https://monsieurbadia.com)

scripts.prod:build:3d-object-builder: parcel build src/3d-object-builder/index.js -d build/ --out-file d2k-3d-object-builder.js --experimental-scope-hoisting --global d2k
scripts.prod:build:rendering-engine: parcel build src/rendering-engine/index.js -d build/ --out-file d2k-rendering-engine.js --experimental-scope-hoisting --global d2k
